Listening to the distant wind chimes...
The sanctuary is silent. Begin your story.

manual.title: The Artisan's Sanctuary Manual
manual.subtitle: Chapter I: The Art of Moss & Stone

philosophy.title: The Way of the Forest
paragraphs: In the quiet of the morning, there is only the Washiâ€”a pristine, untouched white void. Then came the Brush, guided by your breath, bringing the first drop of evergreen to the surface.
Rupa is your rural sanctuary. Here, pixels aren't just dataâ€”they are Leaves. Every mark you make is a deliberate act of tending a garden that requires patience, focus, and a peaceful heart.
"We do not just paint pixels; we weave stories into the moss of time."

pillars.title: The Artisan's Brush
pillars.description: Your voice in the sanctuary. Move it with the Arrow Keys to guide your patterns with the precision of a master gardener.

pillars.title: The Natural Pigments
pillars.description: Rich extracts from forest flora. Apply them with Space and switch pigments using the numbers on your keyboard.

pillars.title: The Washi Sheets
pillars.description: Layers of depth. Like stacking fine washi paper, each sheet adds a new dimension to your story.

techniques.title: Fluid Moss-Painting
techniques.description: Hold Ctrl while moving to stream pigment across the washi. Flow like water in a stream.

techniques.title: Spirit Gathering
techniques.description: Press W to select all connected leaves of the same tone. A mystical way to rearrange your garden.

techniques.title: The Seasons' Flow
techniques.description: Create sequences of servings to breathe life into your work. Press P to feel the pulse of nature.

techniques.title: Resonant Sanctuary
techniques.description: Listen. The sanctuary responds to your focus with piano melodies and distant wind chimes.
